definition: to officially launch (a policy, program etc)/to appear on stage/to appear publicly/(of a bar girl) to leave with a client

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)

sentences.english: Farmers are revolting over a new sliding-scale increase in export taxes.
sentences.chinese: 农场主对新出台的出口税率浮动上调政策非常不满。

sentences.english: They offer score systems or membership systems to consolidate the consumption group.
sentences.chinese: 积分制，会员制不断出台稳定消费群。

sentences.english: A：Do you know when our governmental housing will be assigned?
sentences.chinese: 你知道政府福利房分配方案何时出台吗？

sentences.english: Last year, we introduced the new 36 guidelines on encouraging and guiding the non-governmental investment.
sentences.chinese: 去年我们又出台了鼓励和引导民营资本投资的36条。

sentences.english: The Security Administration Punishment Law being paid close attention to has been enacted recently.
sentences.chinese: 倍受瞩目的《治安管理处罚法》新近出台。

sentences.english: This should be the current policy was due inwardness.
sentences.chinese: 这应该是此次政策出台的应有深意。

sentences.english: FDA looks to curb abuse of cough medicine.
sentences.chinese: 美国FDA计划出台措施，遏止滥用止咳药。

sentences.english: The evacuation plans came against a background of mounting concern over the possibility of a nuclear catastrophe.
sentences.chinese: 这份撤离方案出台自对核灾难威胁逐步增大的考虑下。

sentences.english: Moreover, official publications have expressed caution about putting the sweeping rules into effect.
sentences.chinese: 官方出版物正在对这项“扫荡”计划的出台做着辩白。

sentences.english: "Workers paid annual leave regulations" promulgated at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 《职工带薪年休假条例》同时出台。

sentences.english: " Ballproof bust bodice " publish the proposal that comes from a policewoman.
sentences.chinese: “防弹胸罩”的出台来自一名女警察的建议。

sentences.english: The development of the review has informed the Alliance`s strategy in this area. The Alliance HPSR is now initiating two new capacity development initiatives, namely
sentences.chinese: 这一文件的出台通报了联盟在这一领域的战略。

sentences.english: The approval of Anti-secession Law is a leap in the process of China's rule of law.
sentences.chinese: 《反分裂国家法》的出台是中国依法执政的新飞跃。

sentences.english: "Let us now is about to publish the muttering about the new" law of post.
sentences.chinese: 现在让我们焦头烂额的是即将出台的新《邮政法》。

sentences.english: At present, our country has not an intact and unified antimonopoly law.
sentences.chinese: 在当前，我国没有一部完整统一的反垄断法出台。

sentences.english: The refusal of the actor turned all our arrangements for the performance topsy-turvy.
sentences.chinese: 那个演员拒绝出台把我们整个演出安排都搞乱了。

definition: to issue/to proclaim/to enact (laws, decrees etc)
new policy/New Deal (Roosevelt's 1933 policy to deal with the Great Depression)
to issue (a memorandum etc) to lower levels/to distribute (e.g. disaster relief to victims)
to put in place/to put into practice/to take effect
